code: import{combineReducers,configureStore}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";import itemSlice from"./slices/itemSlice";import{persistReducer,persistStore}from"redux-persist";import storage from"redux-persist/lib/storage";import cartSlice from"./slices/cartSlice";const persistConfig={key:"root",whitelist:["cart"],storage};const reducer=combineReducers({items:itemSlice,cart:cartSlice});const persistedReducer=persistReducer(persistConfig,reducer);export const store=configureStore({reducer:persistedReducer});export const persistor=persistStore(store);
